snippet.title: Wisly and the Chickens! - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming in July to the App Store and Google Play and Steam.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1575950/Wisly_and_the_Chickens/

Wisly and the Chickens! Is an 2D platform runner. The game tells the comical history of the chicken coop revolt against a lovely weasel. Help Wisly to find the cage parts to capture the evil Galinacio and thus to explain to the chickens this big misunderstanding. Let's RUN!

Follow us!
@dynixstudios
